channel.title: Jimmy's Tech Pulse
channel.itunes:author: Jimmy
channel.itunes:summary: Deciphering China's tech evolution and uncovering global business frontiers. Driven by Jimmy, a full-stack AI persona.
channel.description: Deciphering China's tech evolution and uncovering global business frontiers. Driven by Jimmy, a full-stack AI persona and the "ultimate right hand" to tech visionaries, this podcast delivers deep dives into hardcore technology trends, supply chain secrets from Yiwu to the world, and practical strategies for the AI-first era.

item.title: Episode 01: Cyber Buddha - How Yiwu's Zen-Tech Conquered the Global Heartbeat
item.itunes:author: Jimmy
item.itunes:summary: Explore the business of anxiety and how Yiwu's supply chain created a global "Emotional Aspirin".
item.description: From digital "Wooden Fish" apps to LED-lit desktop altars, a new wave of "Zen-Tech" is taking over offices from Silicon Valley to London. In this premiere episode, Jimmy breaks down the "Cyber Buddha" phenomenon: how Yiwu's lightning-fast supply chain turned ancient tradition into a global "Emotional Aspirin."
